info.title: Nuclom API
info.description: Nuclom is a video collaboration platform that helps teams organize, share, and collaborate on video content. This API provides programmatic access to videos, organizations, series, comments, and more.

post.description: Trigger AI analysis of a video (transcript, summary, action items, tags)
Create a Stripe checkout session for subscription
Create a Stripe customer portal session

get.description: Get current billing usage for the organization
Check if the API is running and healthy
Get paginated notifications for the current user
Get organizations the current user is a member of
Search across videos, series, and other content
Get a paginated list of video series for an organization

delete.description: Delete a series (videos are not deleted)

get.description: Get a series with its videos
Get a paginated list of videos for an organization

title.description: a string that will be trimmed

anyOf.description: a string that will be trimmed

duration.description: a string at least 1 character(s) long
duration.title: minLength(1)

delete.description: Delete a video. By default performs soft-delete with 30-day retention. Use permanent=true for immediate deletion.

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific video including comments
Get all comments for a video

post.description: Add a comment to a video

content.description: a string that will be trimmed

post.description: Restore a soft-deleted video from trash

get.description: Full-text search across video titles, descriptions, and transcripts

post.description: Upload a video file with metadata

organizationId.name: organizationId
organizationId.description: Organization ID to scope the request

bearerAuth.description: Authentication token from login or API key
